display_long_description:
**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!
[media]
# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
[media]
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
[media]
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
[media]
# Two Environments Included and Counting!
[media]
# Health and Safety Warning
All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.

**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!

# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75300188_1355526652351506_2178293079657922896_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=0cqVrhsgLD0Q7kNvwGaFk7f&_nc_oc=AdlKOgtcv6p2MmTpmYKlxv6CAmvPPLRyGbejduYA4vEcWiUDq_AJ57g06dN_hYoPTW4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=T0AfQvrmWxCDtnOhOp3alA&oh=00_AfLF90sNFcCHpPCGmeWL02twluV8bBtB4IFXFAzRPGo1jQ&oe=684531A4)
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031656_569899209002816_7347204436020726564_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=4JlX6Z-KdygQ7kNvwHwZypi&_nc_oc=AdkMkp0mermzXPo1GQSVZksfDoKBFEJzEia_im5QaeUXzR2nZWJouukmdojD7WkPghQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=T0AfQvrmWxCDtnOhOp3alA&oh=00_AfJiuRIN-MSOCLU0kN4cZ-MTG8Ky7_aGKxntPslDZBAJ7w&oe=684518B2)
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982555_3774236489481402_8390222632881012321_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cY7-8PszmWsQ7kNvwEZfKC3&_nc_oc=AdnAWnsLh16s2QA4fjF5IMrce1Gj1dWz2T5019KCCqQwLr0JSeXll8ONd7Eigpr2cIE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=T0AfQvrmWxCDtnOhOp3alA&oh=00_AfKKVK3JFmxqOxoLR-Zkh9hGx9ujmPFTxTwW6DHEn062Dw&oe=68452F85)

All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.
